casebody.data:
(May 29, 1952.)

(Republish.)

Julia Falk et al., Respondents, v. Crystal Hall Inc. et al., Appellants.

As defendants were joint tortfeasors we think the result arrived at by Trial Term was correct. Present — Peck, P. J., Dore, Cohn, Callahan and Shientag, JJ. [See ante, p. 1071; 280 App. Div. 861.]
